er_text: Good experience with a specialized repair at the commercial property I manage. The job was done to surpass our expectation and we would work with this contractor again.

Audra Franks Painting Company is an extremely professional and very proficient in high end work.  I met them when they painted my restaurant  years ago,  and to this day I will only have them paint my businesses and home. The fact that this company cares enough to use products that are environmentally friendly (and before anyone else was) means a great deal. On a personal note, Audra is a caring person who gives back to her community. When you are looking for someone that does what they say this is the company you want to call.
